node.name: EcSplorer
node.shortdescription:
EcSplorer (Eclipse Simplified Explorer) is/has :
- an exploring tool for the file system,
- a tool for searching in the file system (grep and find),
- an integrated FTP client (with direct editing option),
- and a tool for executing batch processes
with many many features...
(min. requirements: Eclipse 3.2 and Java 1.5)




EcSplorer is now ready for Eclipse Galileo.
node.body:
EcSplorer (Eclipse Simplified Explorer) is/has :
- an exploring tool for the file system,
- a tool for searching in the file system (grep and find),
- an integrated FTP client (with direct editing option),
- and a tool for executing batch processes
with many many features...
(min. requirements: Eclipse 3.2 and Java 1.5)




EcSplorer is now ready for Eclipse Galileo.
